properties.name: Santa Claus Park
properties.description: Posted by H2otownCalifornia Street, Newton, MAPublic Park, next to Dunkin\' Donuts, just a bit past Stop N Shop on California Street. Huge statue of Santa Claus, trees all lit, other lights strung, an actual mailbox to drop your "Letters To Santa" in. Great place for kids to see. 5 Stars!!!
